sentences.sContent: I never liked long walks, especially in winter.
sentences.sCn: 我向来不喜欢长距离散步，尤其在冬天。

sentences.sContent: Art books are expensive to produce, especially if they contain colour illustrations.
sentences.sCn: 美术类书籍制作成本很高，尤其是那些带彩色插图的。

sentences.sContent: I was especially fond of chocolate biscuits.
sentences.sCn: 我特别爱吃巧克力饼干。

sentences.sContent: ...and it is especially famous for its sunrise and sea of clouds...
...especially to the elders or patients who are badly ill...
...especially the kids who need them most...
...especially when outsourcing it is so harmful...
...Reading is especially important for primary and middle school students...
...especially getting up before dawn to catch that 6:30 train...

trans.tranOther: used to emphasize that something is more important or happens more with one particular thing than with others
